title: Minecraft PE：有关0.10.0的发布日期
author: BensonQC
txt_content:
本帖最后由 _Benson_ 于 2014-8-8 16:22 编辑 




Minecraft PE: 
News: Its estimated that 0.10.0 will be ready in a few months, but there are still a lot of variables that can affect it
RT

Minecraft PE：
新闻：据估计，0.10.0将会在几个月内准备好，但仍然有很多的变量可以影响它。
回推【Retweet】
